医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
言语很重要：以同理心和希望来诊断帕金森病随着美国帕金森病的诊断率持续上升，患者接触运动障碍专家的机会有限，这意味着传达毁灭性的、改变生活的消息的工作落在了初级保健医生或社区神经科医生身上，他们可能不具备完成这项敏感任务所需的专业知识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Words-matter-Delivering-Parkinsons-diagnosis-with-empathy-and-hope.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Words-matter-Delivering-Parkinsons-diagnosis-with-empathy-and-hope.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=034f871b-fb77-4dbb-8ddc-df02862b2039 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 23:12:37 -0500 Words matter: Delivering Parkinson's diagnosis with empathy and hope
最近的泌尿学试验更有可能包含有关治疗有害影响的数据美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊《The Journal of Urology®》一月号的一项研究报告称，近年来，主要泌尿外科期刊上的临床试验报告更有可能包含有关治疗有害影响的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Recent-urology-trials-more-likely-to-include-data-on-harmful-effects-of-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Recent-urology-trials-more-likely-to-include-data-on-harmful-effects-of-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc7b1184-6ef5-4205-92e2-dc3f8565f822 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:58:53 -0500 Recent urology trials more likely to include data on harmful effects of treatments
种族健康不平等比经济差异更能激发对变革的支持一项新的研究发现，与健康和身体健康相关的种族差异比与经济等其他因素相关的种族差异更能激励美国人采取社会变革行动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Racial-health-inequalities-spark-more-support-for-change-than-economic-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Racial-health-inequalities-spark-more-support-for-change-than-economic-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31c8ec42-a08d-4bcf-9175-f73f5ebaaf08 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:47:50 -0500
研究揭示麻疹病毒如何在人脑中变异和传播梅奥诊所的研究人员绘制了麻疹病毒如何在患有罕见致命脑部疾病的人的大脑中突变和传播的图谱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Study-reveals-how-measles-virus-mutates-and-spreads-in-the- human-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Study-reveals-how-measles-virus-mutates-and-spreads-in-the- human-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32016125-8651-4e54-9dd9-4f6e3314c7e7 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:38:55 -0500 Study reveals how measles virus mutates and spreads in the human brain
嗅女性的眼泪可能是抑制男性攻击性的关键12 月 21 日发表在 PLOS Biology 开放获取期刊上的新研究表明，女性的眼泪中含有阻止男性攻击性的化学物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Sniffing-womene28099s-tears-could-be-the-key-to-taming-male-aggression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Sniffing-womene28099s-tears-could-be-the-key-to-taming-male-aggression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5648faff-cdcb-4edd-a2cc-36915c37daeb Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:34:06 -0500 Sniffing women’s tears could be the key to taming male aggression
研究强调恶性尿路梗阻患者的临终关怀未得到充分利用泌尿外科官方杂志《泌尿学实践》一月号上的一篇论文报道，只有不到一半的恶性输尿管梗阻 (MUO) 患者（一种晚期癌症的严重并发症，预后不良）接受姑息治疗 (PC)。美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Study-highlights-underutilization-of-end-of-life-care-for-病人-with-malignant-urinary-obstruction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Study-highlights-underutilization-of-end-of-life-care-for-病人-with-malignant-urinary-obstruction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=450c36ab-9a54-4890-ad86-d72e30f8f095 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 22:02:03 -0500 Study highlights underutilization of end-of-life care for patients with malignant urinary obstruction
加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究人员获得 300 万美元资金用于开发用于侵袭性前列腺癌检测的人工智能加州大学洛杉矶分校健康琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员获得了国家癌症研究所为期五年、价值 300 万美元的资助，用于识别新型癌症生物标志物并开发能够检测和预测侵袭性前列腺癌的人工智能，以帮助避免不必要的治疗及其相关的负面影响影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/UCLA-researchers-receive-243-million-to-develop-AI-for-aggressive-prostate-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/UCLA-researchers-receive-243-million-to-develop-AI-for-aggressive-prostate-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2901c9a5-ebb9-4a98-af12-c7692505d2d3 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 21:56:24 -0500 UCLA researchers receive $3 million to develop AI for aggressive prostate cancer detection
圣裘德研究人员揭示帕金森氏症相关蛋白质的结构圣裘德儿童研究医院的科学家揭示了两种帕金森病相关蛋白质的复杂结构，这两种蛋白质都与迟发性病例有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/St-Jude-researchers-reveal-struct-of-Parkinsons-linked- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/St-Jude-researchers-reveal-struct-of-Parkinsons-linked- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c5279b1-ca55-4695-af9d-56750a7539f8 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 21:53:11 -0500 St. Jude researchers reveal structure of Parkinson's-linked proteins
正在开发用于男性乳腺癌诊断的突破性治疗工具犹他大学亨茨曼癌症研究所细胞生长和分化核控制项目成员、犹他大学神经科学家、神经生物学和人类遗传学教授 Christopher Gregg 博士被医生诊断为第四期2018年转移性乳腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Groundwriting-treatment-tool-being-development-for-male-breast-cancer-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/Groundwriting-treatment-tool-being-development-for-male-breast-cancer-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dfa6047-4d44-428b-8490-192a1bae2244 Thu, 21 Dec 2023 21:00:44 -0500 Groundbreaking treatment tool being developed for male breast cancer diagnosis
D-丙氨酸与肾脏糖异生和生物钟有关直到最近，人们才发现氨基酸（蛋白质的组成部分）以两种不同的形式存在：L-形式和D-形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/D-alanine-linked-to-gluconeogenesis-in-the-kidney-and-circadian-clock.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231221/D-alanine-linked-to-gluconeogenesis-in-the-kidney-and-circadian-clock.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a29f384e-fbc8-4786-afcf-9fcac02b8b4b Thu, 21 Dec 2023 20:08:49 -0500 D-alanine linked to gluconeogenesis in the kidney and circadian clock
